properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (not(FolderPath contains "\\")) and (not((((FolderPath in~ ("System", "Registry", "MemCompression", "vmmem")) or (ProcessCommandLine in~ ("Registry", "MemCompression", "vmmem"))) or (FolderPath in~ ("-", "")) or isnull(FolderPath))))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Checks whether the image specified in a process creation event is not a full, absolute path (caused by process ghosting or other unorthodox methods to start a process)
